title: "Versatile, Creative and Organized Notion Helps Get My Life in Order"
description: Initially I was intimidated and overwhelmed, however once I learned the basics and started working daily with Notion I found myself liking it very much and enjoying the process of creating notes and database systems to organize both my business and person life.

title: "Great tool for organized workflow"
description: Overall, Notion has been a great resource for getting organized and maximizing efficiency in our daily workflow.

title: "Notion is fast, easy to learn, and flexible."
description: Overall, I love the ease and flexibility Notion provides. If I were a team of one, or my team needed the full functionality of Notion instead of more task management, I would have continued to use the program.

title: "Notion’s Biggest Fan"
description: I cannot recommend it enough as a tool for a Startup or any company or person to use. It’s really easy to use but it can also do so much!

title: "nothing to wrote about"
description: there is nothing i can say because they did not perform their duty and the break down of tools is not been provide

title: "Notion keeps our internal documentation tidy."
description: Instead of individual spreadsheets and docs everywhere, we now have a central billing wiki that’s easy to search and keep up to date.

title: "Power and Flexibility"
description: Notion has become a vital tool for our team, and for me as an individual who has several tedious processes each week.

title: "Great for Project Management"
description: Overall it was ok, we ended up switching to a more user friendly project management provider as we have no coding.

title: "My overall experience "
description: I'm using Notion now, and I find it super easy and practical. But some blocks are still unfamiliar to me, and I’d like some help using them

title: "Pretty cool"
description: I like it overall, I'd test it out if it fits your needs and also the size of information you want on it

title: "Easy integrations improved my work every day"
"Useful for linking Database "
description: Useful when you need a place to tie everything together, docs, tables, whatever. Lets you build your own way of working. But can be a bit much at the start, takes a while to set it how it makes sense

title: "Connects my long-term planning with weekly tasks"
"Sleek and professional productivity tracker, has grown more sophisticated but also complicated over time "
description: I think it's great for when you want to almost be extra-organised abt something, giving a project a sense of formality. However I feel like the app has become more business-friendly over the years and focuses less on users that utilise it for personal productivity

title: "Notion is my second brain!"
description: It's been great to use notion for personal and professional organization. Once I set up my account, it's been easy to focus on getting things done instead of struggling with a system.

title: "All in one powerhouse"
description: Once I got the hang of it, Notion became super helpful for organizing my personal life, schoolwork, and business ideas.

title: "A useful tool for work and personal use"
"Great for personal, but I'm hesitant for teams."
description: Notion has been a great tool for my personal productivity, note-taking, and project management. I don't think I will ever expand its use to include my work teams.

title: "Powerful, but not that intuitive."
description: It has potential, but it’s not my first choice unless I have the time to build out a full system from scratch. It can work well if you're willing to invest the effort upfront, but for quick, structured workflows, there are faster options out there.

title: "Took me a minute"
description: Tried it to keep my notes in one place. Took a bit to get it at first but now I use it sometimes for random stuff.

title: "Notion has good templates "
description: Notion gives a free trial to navigate in&out the app that one only is a breeze and all their features are functioning properly

title: "Allows me to monitor improvement using databases"
"Not the right tool for everyone "
description: Good at first, then frustrating, then I ditched it. I don’t need all the functionality it has and I certainly don’t need the distraction.

title: "Clear UX, great for productivity and collaboration"
description: Great. I use it daily for collaboration and outlining projects. Design and UX is very clear, a perfect tool for collaboration.

title: "Notion: A go-to Marketing & Social Media Tool! "
description: I have been using Notion for less than a year. I love organizing my to-do lists and projects that I need to work on. It is helping me to stay organized with my social media & marketing planning, which can feel overwhelming sometimes. But Notion helps me to stay focused and engaged with ease.

title: "Amazing way to run my business"
description: I was skeptical at first, but when I made the switch, my business got a whole lot earier to run. I now run everything through notion

title: "Endless possibilities which can get a bit messy"
description: Great experience but the endless possibilities make it difficult to use from a UX. It would be greater if it was a bit more structured.

title: "Great tool for easy to complex project management "
description: So far it’s been great- we use it for task management, project management and a central database for all of our docs.

title: "The only workspace i need in notion"
description: Notion manages my whole digital marketing stack. Rather than manage multiple tools, I make project boards, share briefs with clients and track performance insights all in one place. It’s what keeps our boutique team on the same page and in fighting shape.

title: "Notion is great!"
description: We use Notion heavily at our company for our internal knowledge base. It's so useful to be able to link to everything and have databases.

title: "Stack Space "
description: Notion to keep personal notes in check, ended up building full project hubs, content calendars, client portals, all in the same space

title: "It's a great program for tracking tasks and making check lists! I wish there was a little bit more visual customizations. "
description: It's a great program for tracking tasks and making checklists! I wish there was a little bit more visual customizations.

title: "Swiss Army Knife of Productivity"
description: I have built our entire knowledge system on Notion and it’s become the go to spot for everything we need to reference or update as a team.

title: "How I organise my creative work with Notion"
description: I brought all of my creative work into one centralized place and as a result was better able to collaborate with my editors and researchers and better able to stayed on schedule with my productions.

title: "How to organize your thoughts easily with notion"
description: By integrating Notion into the gallery’s structure, we reduced email back-and-forth and had a hub that kept our projects moving on time.

title: "Un outil de gestion de projet"
description: Notion est génial pour organiser tout, de mes projets à mes notes. Super flexible, mais parfois un peu trop, ce qui peut être déroutant au début.

title: "My go-to for work and personal stuff!"
description: I use it all the time and having an iphone app that ties in is really helpful on the move with work, and personal. I'd be a bit lost without it.

title: "Where all my coaching ideas live"
description: I use Notion for keep all my plans, workout ideas, client progress and some goals. It's like my brain on a page, I put everything in one place

title: "Steep custom curve"
description: I tried Notion for a few weeks, but I didn’t keep it as main management tool because I don’t find without doubt privileges but it will take me enormously to configure everything again, and I don’t see how to send there all the data already on my current tools

title: "The Every... one's Choice"
description: Notion is less of a ready-made app and more of a toolkit—like digital LEGOs for structuring projects, ideas, and workflows. If rigid organizational tools frustrate you, Notion's ability to mirror your personal thought process can be a game-changer. But it requires a willingness to experiment, tweak, and refine your setup. If you're looking for a highly customizable solution and are willing to invest time upfront, Notion can be a powerful asset. If you prefer simplicity over customization, it might not be the ideal choice.

title: "Outstanding tool to organize marketing campaigns."
description: It’s kept our marketing team all on the same page across multiple projects, easing hand-overs and reducing multi person chaos.

title: "The Ultimate Customizable Task/Project/Data Manager "
description: I love using notion. I have spent time just learning about different things I can do in it. That tells you that a tool is good when you are excited to learn all the different ways you can use it. Plus the access to the Notion and public generated templates make it easy for you to start off 90% set up if not 100% set up. And if you change what you want to do you can always change it however you want.

title: "Notion: The Ultimate Productivity Playground"
description: Notion feels like a digital playground for productivity. Once I got past the initial setup and learned how to use its building blocks, it became a central hub for both work and personal projects. For those who enjoy flexibility and customization, it’s a powerful tool.

title: "Useful for tracking studio sesh's and project notes."
description: It’s simplified the process of keeping organized across several recording sessions, presentations and post-production activities, allowing us to spend more time creating and less time chasing paperwork.

title: "Notion: The "go-to" task management tool for everyone. "
description: I use it on a personal level, and also at work. At work, the whole team has access to the premium version, which is definitely a time saver when tackling several internal needs like L&D, documents storing and accessibility, and collaborative tasking. I highly recommend Notion.

title: "Great app beyond note taking"
description: Excellent is what describes my experience with Notion. Very decent for note taking, project organization and sharing insights with my team

title: "Notion - the software to give you the most structured and organized notes"
"A Type A Girl's Dream in App Form"
description: Great for integration and getting aligned with team members. Fantastic space to return to when we're searching/rediscovering our North Star. It's now an almost daily part of my routine that helps so much with organisation.

title: "Versatile Workspace Platform"
description: Notion offers flexible options for building your own app and creating different workflows such as databases, to-do lists, and note-taking systems.

title: "My operations nerve center in one tab."
description: Ever since our ops planning moved into Notion, I spend less time hunting down files and more time sculpting client journeys. Our travel packages have become better organized, and team communication has been tightened up, particularly around client preferences and last-minute changes.

title: "Great tool, can be overwhelming at first"
"A flexible and powerful workflow organiser"
description: I've been really impressed with Notion so far. It is simple to use, the free trial is generous and it is surprisingly flexible and powerful.

title: "I used as a website management software "
"Put Project Power into Notion"
description: A powerful system to organize thoughts and processes for projects.

title: "Notion Review"
description: Notion is a versatile workspace platform with great note taking and collaboration features.

title: "Amazing for those that have the time to set it up"
description: Very good experience with Notion in general, they are always improving. I started using it during my studies, and continued to use it for oth my career and personal life. Many modern companies also use it for their company wiki, which is great! I always encourage modern startups to start using Notion

title: "Notion has been a game-changer for me"
description: My top pick of this year! I find Notion so incredible and love it so much

title: "Powerful tool with plenty of templates that suit many different use cases"
description: Positive, it's great for journaling for me, easy to add journals and to edit them. Flexible with adding images, videos and of course, text.

title: "Get organized with Notion"
description: It's a good way to organize your life all in one place. It has taken place of the "notes" app and "reminders" app on my phone.

title: "Notion supports the interconnected way my brain works"
description: I use Notion as a student and as a professional with two jobs; I use it as a personal workspace and not as part of any shared environment. It helps me stay organized by letting me link all my different notes/thoughts to other elements within Notion as well as on the internet. I can keep a reading list of articles and things that interest me, manage my personal to do list, plan trips, maintain a log of meeting notes, journal/brainstorm, craft a library database, and all kinds of things I haven't even discovered yet. It can be overwhelming to get started because there are so many options, but once you get the flow of things, you can really make it work for you.

title: "Stay Organized and keep your ideas in one place. "
description: Notion has become one of my go-to tools for organizing both work and personal projects to keep my notes and plans in one place.

title: "A Versatile Organizer with a Few Hiccups"
description: Notion has been a game-changer for managing projects and clients. Its customizable workspace keeps everything organized, and the Q&A AI feature helps me find information fast, saving time during hectic days. The Notion Calendar integration is a lifesaver for scheduling without juggling apps.

title: "Worked as my personal assistant in my life."
description: At Suho Garmindo, it’s been a life saver in terms of organizing testing schedules and tracking progress, which made it easier to collaborate on quality checks with my fellow team members.

title: "The tool you don't want to miss"
description: Great, I really love Notion, I use it a lot to track things and organize documentation.

title: "Notion is great!!"
description: Super user friendly and makes project organization easy!!

title: "Great for knowledge management "
description: I love Notion for taking notes and writing my documents on it

title: "A great tool for high level of project managemwnt"
description: Was good but to much sophisticated for my usage

title: "An Amazing App from a satisfied Notion User"
description: While i plan my Daily To-Do list, Notion gives me the appropriate arrangement needed to execute my plans without omitting any task.

title: "its so dinamic but required more AI functionalities"
description: was so compicated at first but then was easy because its to similar another documentation apps likewise confluence

title: "Great for Agendas"
description: I've used notion for agendas and team notes.

title: "Notion - The Platform of Great Customization"
description: Notion is a great product. Notion, by design gives you the freedom to create many custom systems for various business needs. Notion gives you the feeling that you are coding your own platform with a great scale of customizability. I have built an inventory system, a knowledge base, and many other custom systems with Notion.

title: "Good bases to start management if you already got your bearings"
description: It was Ok, I tought the integration of AI would make it easier

title: "Notion is love"
description: I love Notion. I've been using the product for 5+ years already trying to bring it to all the companies that I worked for. The thing they pulled off with speeding the thing up while adding a ton of features to an already rich feature set was miraculous (think Notion AI, formulas revamping, layouts and forms).

title: "Notion, the big leader is in fact clearly deceiving."
description: I have explored various ways to use Notion, creating databases to visualize important data and formatting notes to enhance clarity and readability. When it comes to note-taking itself, Notion is quite effective. However, the AI features leave much to be desired. Notion's AI is significantly less capable than ChatGPT, with unconvincing functionalities. The AI is slow, and when used on pages with extensive data, it experiences severe latency, often freezing for several minutes. Overall, Notion is an average note-taking tool that falls far short of my expectations. Due to my unsatisfactory experience, I have recently decided to switch to Obsidian, which I find much better suited for fully custom complex and useful note-taking.

title: "Notion Lover since I was a student, and now working!"
description: Overall, this is one of the best productivity tool to those people who love to organize stuffs! I used this when I was still a student, and even now when I'm already working!

title: "Dream it build it Life OS "
description: I use it on a daily basis as my Life operating system. Habits tracker, journaling, weekly/monthly reviews, project/tasks management etc. It is just so handy that I can mould it into anything I want

title: "utilização pessoal"
description: utilizei para fins pessoais, para controlar minhas atividades do dia a dia, mas também para fazer um controle de metas e objetivos. achei bem completa e capaz de criar de tudo um pouco.

title: "HUGE thumbs up!"
description: I’ve had such a great experience using Notion. Not one day goes by that I don’t use the platform. I don’t know what I would do without it

title: "Notion - Your go to productivity assistant "
description: I've had a great experience with notion and I'd highly recommend it to anyone especially in the content creation game

title: "Notion API c'est la vie !"
description: Fluide, adaptée, exponentielle. Le logiciel ouvre des possibles importants

title: "Nice looking but a bit overkill on the features"
description: Overall it was a pretty tool - it looked nice and had lots of options but got too complicated for my needs.

title: "A must have for efficient businesses"
description: I have been thoroughly impressed with Notion since we started using it as a tool. We have now been able to centralise all our documentation, task management and projects into a single source of truth - a gamechanger for us.

title: "Notion AI frees up a lot of time"
"App with an incredible potential"
description: You can find a lot of powerful Notion dashboards made by the community (for free or paid) which demonstrates how powerful Notion is. I principally use Notion for wikis, for code snippets, and in order to save useful information in one place.

title: "Organizing Everything"
description: I used Notion for a lot of time, and it could be one of the best tools for organizing notes, tasks, and projects in one place

title: "Satisfy by using different functions"
description: Overall, I am satisfied with using this app for time management, and can make an effective daily routine.

title: "Notion, compagnons de vie"
description: J'utilise notion pour prendre mes cours, et également dans ma vie pro en tant que commercial. Il me sert à planifier mes taches et garder des fiches métier importantes que je dois retrouver facilement.

title: "I can imagine now my business without Notion"
description: very satisfied, and i love integration and lot of options

title: "Great for organiztion"
description: It is mostly positive. I love how it keeps everything organized in one place and is super flexible, but a lot of improvements can still be made for instance, the mobile app could be better.

title: "Everyday user, BIG fan! "
description: Overall love it! I use it everyday and especially love playing around with the AI writing function.

title: "In regards to Notion"
description: Using it mainly to create & share documentation for internal procedures and other rules and regulations for the firm. Easy to share, fair learning curve and great UI.

title: "All We Need to Stay Organised"
description: On the whole, in a short period of time, Notion has brought order into the life of our project teams

title: "Notion | Be Productive and Efficient"
description: Notion is my one of a kind tool, when it comes to staying productive and in a fixed schedule. Managing both time and being efficient.

title: "lots of customization possibilities. "
description: steep learning curve, but once you get passed it, it is worth it.

title: "What You Need to Comprehend About Notion During Evaluation"
"Good software for teams!"
description: Great experience! Definetly recommended.

title: "Good application"
description: My experience with notion is a good one..I like the app

title: "Pas fiable. A fuir."
description: Programme très prometteur, mais disfonctionne. Je l'utilise depuis longtemps et aujourd'hui, je constate que certaines de mes bases ou de mes enregistrement dans une base ont disparu.

title: "Awesome value at a great price!"
description: I can confidently say Notion has been a great tool! There's a bit of a learning curve process to go through at first since there are so many options available for customizing your dashboard, but after you get there, you'll be able to plan efficiently! I love that I can have shared dashboards with other team members as well as my own. Another plus is the fact that I can link external documents so that everything is in one place and has easy access.

title: "Its magical!!"
description: As a little business my daughter and I use Notion for organizing our products

title: "I use it for note taking and planning my life and study."
description: It is changing the way I organize my life. I used it to organize my wedding, logging everything from vendor contacts to the guest list, and it saved me untold hours. At work, it’s become my collaboration cockpit. An one-stop shop where I replace several tools like Trello and Evernote.

title: "Double your potential with Notion"
description: I find Notion really useful, it is one of the softwares that I use daily. I can just recommend it if you want to work organised.

title: "Incredible software, easy to use and customize to purpose"
description: Notion has really helped improve my productivity and planning, I like that I can just imagine anything and bring it to life on notion, I strongly recommend for everyone that needs a online notepad with many great features

title: "A fantastic all-in-one knowledge base"
description: The experience is overall very positive, and I often find myself missing various features when using other equivalent tools.

title: "Aaron Notion"
description: Overall pretty good. Nice way for me to organize my notes.

title: "Notion's customization is amazing and we couldn't live without it! "
description: Working with Notion has been great, I love the custom features, I love that we can use it to manage so many things, goal tracking, project management, HR handbooks, shared calendars, there's so many benefits.

title: "Notion takes organization to the extreme!"
description: It was good. I like how to manage customers with it.

title: "A personal favorite of mine"
description: Overall, I love it. I use Notion just about every day for both work and personal projects and even after months of use, I still haven't had any issues. Its a wonderful application and one of my personal favorites.

title: "The perfect pocket organiser."
description: I've had a great experience using it since my college days to now also using it as a professional. The UI is interactive and easy to understand. The new AI feature is a cherry on top. I would recommend it to everyone!

title: "Good for small team "
description: It is cheerful as it offers a basic plan for free, but it takes some time to get used to the system (though don't be disheartened if you're a fast learner!)

title: "Notion is fantastic "
description: Notion has been really helpful for me. I use it pretty much every day.

title: "Notion: so much more than just notes"
description: Notion is a great introduction to modern note taking and data capture/management.

title: "My honest take on Notion"
description: Overall, Notion is a super useful app that helps with organizing and tidying everything no matter how complex. It's an excellent tool for business and students alike if you are willing to invest the time to get a hang of its features.

title: "Push Through the Learning Curve"
description: Now that I am more familiar with Notion, I find it a very useful site.

title: "Nothing like any other AI tools."
description: I experience with Notion AI is fantastic so far.

title: "The Best Organizing Tool You'll Ever Need"
description: I have been brainstorming a lot using Notion, it helped me a lot from planning my big life decisions to organizing my day-to-day tasks with more clarity and easiness

title: "Notion Never Gave Me Motion"
description: Frustrating. Maybe I'm not built for engineering-precise note-taking and hierarchical tagging. Maybe the whole idea of neatly-organized files is an ideal that appeals to me only in the abstract, while I merrily play in my own messy pile of journals, notes, and digital ephemera

title: "We use it daily, but it can be much better."
"I’m a BIG fan of Notion"
description: I love Notion and I use it for all my task tracking. I have also recommended to others, especially in the start-up space.

title: "Helpful tool but hard to learn. "
description: Notion is a useful tool if you have the time to learn how it works. It was not user friendly, and it was left us frustrated on more than one occasion.

title: "Outil collaboratif performant"
description: Plutôt satisfaite de l'outil dans l'ensemble, permet une bonne collaboration entre les membres de l'équipe, avec des présentations variées. L'insertion de l'IA est également un point très positif dans l'outil.

title: "Your go to procastination killer "
description: Brilliant and have really noticed the difference in my business

title: "An ALL-IN-1 product perfect in any workspace designed for any specific goals. AMAZING 100%! "
description: Overall, fun and challenging for a new tools like this. Amazing and superb! It excites us to discover such product that perfectly designed and engineered for any specific purpose. Total package is this!

title: "Could be a little bit better"
description: Good. I use it mostly to manage articles and Linkedin posts.

title: "Reminds me of an old-school Diary but with Vibes"
description: This is my go-to for personal task track outside of Asana. The fact that you can separate work-related stuff from sensible work information is a plus

title: "Top notch software with few minor flaws!"
description: Really good notetaking and productive software with few cons.
